ValidationRule.description: If allocation Method = Pro Rata or SSI Sent to Cam to Trade Forfeitures is requried
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Send_to_CAM_to_Trade_Forfeitures__c ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Allocation_Method__c , "Pro Rata") || ISPICKVAL( Allocation_Method__c , "SSI") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Send to CAM to Trade Forfeitures field if SSI or Pro Rata is selected for an allocation Method
